name: Headless_Chromium_Screenshot
author: Joe Vasquez
description: Take screenshot with headless Chromium and save as PNG

configurationItems.name: thehive_url
configurationItems.description: URL pointing to your TheHive installation, e.g. 'http://127.0.0.1:9000'

configurationItems.name: thehive_apikey
configurationItems.description: TheHive API key which is used to add the downloaded file back to the alert/case

configurationItems.name: user_agent
configurationItems.description: User Agent to send, default is Firefox 77.

configurationItems.name: window_size_x
configurationItems.description: Window size for screenshot, default is 1920

configurationItems.name: window_size_y
configurationItems.description: Window size for screenshot, default is 2160
